WRITING.TEXT: Myshkin isn't arrested at the end and Nastassya doesn't die because of him. Interesting point though tying in the title to the theme! My edition says about Myshkin, "in him, his creator, Dostoyevsky, sees Russia's redemption." So I read the book that society thought of Myshkin as the idiot but he is actually what society should strive to be (even though he just seemed like a normal guy)
Very good points and thank you for bringing them up! I thought mostly about Myshkin but Nastassya does seem to be the more interesting character now that you mention it.

WRITING.TITLE: I just finished The Idiot by Fyodor Dostoyevsky and it did not quite resonate like I'd hoped!
WRITING.TEXT:
The Brothers Karamazov is tied for my favorite book of all time (with East of Eden) so I was excited to finally delve into more Dostoyevsky. The Idiot seemed intriguing so I read through it and once again Dostoyevsky was wonderful prose and thought provoking sections. I believe his theme is that Prince Myshkin is the epitome of a human being and character but cannot survive or change the debased society we exist in. He enters it knowing nothing and leaves it in shambles.
My only complaint is that I never really got the sense that Myshkin was anything more than just a normal guy living in a rich social group. He doesn't do anything exceptional or even out of the ordinary. He just had common human deceny and respects others and I'm from the Midwest so that's just the average person. Any thoughts or more perspectives to help me see more into this book?
I hardly ever reread books. I have loved some and would enjoy a reread but there's just so many new ones out there I want to experience!

I have received over 50 books from thriftbooks with only one acceptable book being a little rough. Their very good and like new and exceptional quality for cheap and the shipping usually is only a week for me. I love thriftbooks!
It seems like it's just me but I just don't get it.. discworld is not very fascinating to me at all!
I have this edition and love it! It's my favorite book cover.

Timshel in East or Eden is the only book I can think of where one word represents the entire book and extrapolates to an entire life! We have the choice to do good in our world or to do bad. Such a beautiful word
This book has been on my list for a while and now I defintely will check it out! Cheers!

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for a quote for my college graduation that can beat my Vonnegut contender.
WRITING.TEXT: "true terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country". Any quote from any novel of any genre will work! I'm just looking for a relevant one to starting real life with all my friends and achieving the dreams we had of since we were all little. It is also crazy that these people I have seen do incredibly stupid things are now in important positions so that's why I choose my quote. Mainly trying to avoid "life laugh love" and the other trite quotes you hear all the time! Also what novel it is from wouls be nice to know. Thank you in advance for any of your suggestions!

WRITING.TITLE: How do I become a sponsor to donate books to children?
WRITING.TEXT: I am really looking for something where I can send a book directly to the child wanting that book! In this way I can also send a letter, post card, etc. to possibly become pen pals and offer the kid advice or help if they ever ask for it! Any suggestions?
Brothers Karamazov gave me a very similar feeling to steinbecks work! There is a "real" story taking place that is engaging but philosophically there is a story that is simply captivating.

WRITING.TITLE: Tankrewards for the T14! Is it any fun?
WRITING.TEXT: Pee shooter with some troll armour.. not too worried about anything but how fun it is! Also great work on the tankrewards WG, I'm loving it

I'll start by comparing profits: 881671 for 2014 and 923503 in 2015 an increase of 4.7%. Next sga: 603660 for 2014 (68% of profits) and 932232 (99.9% of profits, looks like Musk and stagg is loving your investments) for 2015 an increase of 52.8%. Ouch. Net income: -294040 for 2014 and -888663 for 2015 an increase in losses of 202.2%. We will see what end of the year 2016 brings. But the numbers make it very obvious that tesla rides on hype, not performance. Hopefully all goes well for the tesla investors though, I wish the best of luck!

Let's hear how tesla is a good growth company then. You have backed up no claims and have added no information. Their financials get worse from the very basic fundamentals I listed but you can see the overall picture just from those with tesla.

Most basic metrics: NEGATIVE earnings per share... thus negative price to earnings and peg ratio. 12x price to book and 6x price to sales. Without even looking further than those it should be evident to any investor that it is overpriced based on the hype, definitely not based on any results.
Tesla is all talk no walk all the time. Very poor financials but people keep pumping it because of Elon's talk.
I gambled some of my profits into hemp. It's an awful awful company and cannot be considered an investment but the speculation might drive it up purely on ticker symbol. Here's hoping!
Started 2 years ago and I am up 36%. My best advice: fundamental analysis on blue chip stocks, buy them at a discounted price then hold, reinvest the dividends. 50 years later buy big yacht

HEMP is a nice penny stock (shitty company) that will jump purely on speculations.

A company acquiring another company pays a higher price (premium) than the stock price value of the company. So if you buy a 70 billion dollar baseball for 85 billion dollars you have dished out some serious dough and your value has gone down. This is the decline we are seeing in T.
Exactly! I sold half my position to lock in some gains and will just see where the rest takes me... let ya know November 7th!

WRITING.TEXT: I am young so accepted the risk and put some of my previous earnings into the shit penny stock company known as HEMP last week. I am now up over $500 on it and wanting it to ride out for another 2 weeks. We will see! Good luck!
